attributes.action: change the law so that prospective parliamentary candidates must have resided in the constituency they wish to represent for at least 2 years prior to being selected to stand at a General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would ensure that all candidates had experienced and understood the local issues that residents in that constituency were concerned about.  At the moment constituents can be represented by someone living possibly hundreds of miles away and this is patently wrong.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
